name: Trivela
description:
Trivela gives a glimpse of what it's like to be an athlete in real life. A game that explores not just this young footballer's professional life but also his personal life, including his relationships with his family, friends, personal problems, and important decisions, among other things.

Story

After spending his entire life training to be a professional footballer, a young guy finally gets his chance and is hired by a Liga 3 team (3rd Portuguese Football League). Because the club is far from where it now resides, this signing will require a house move. Throughout this change our character will revisit certain memories, as many of the objects in his room carry stories and facts that will help you understand a little more about his background and career in the world of football.

Main Features
  • Explore
  • Interact with objects
  • Make a small puzzle
  • Discover the character's past
